sub_title: Senior Inspector Subsurface & Well Engineering at SodM
summary:
Articulate, proactive and engaging leader with high technical standard, an eye for relevant detail within the bigger picture and a track record of delivery in challenging environments.

Key Competencies
Wide-ranging technical understanding, stakeholder engagement and relationship building, excellent cross-discipline integration, strong petrophysics and well integrity background, supportive and energising leadership style, strong safety drive.

Petrophysics skills: Formation evaluation, cement evaluations, contracting, coring, well logging operations, core-log integration, seismic rock properties and fluid substitution, core laboratory operations, petrophysical field studies, technical coaching & mentoring
